subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Separated by nearly 5,000 miles, the Chicago Fire and the Red Bulls, who are training in Salzburg, Austria, have rekindled what is quickly developing into a contentious feud.
snippet: Separated by nearly 5,000 miles, the Chicago Fire and the Red Bulls, who are training in Salzburg, Austria, have rekindled what is quickly developing into a contentious feud.
